About Glory Days Grill
History
In 1996, Glory Days Grill began in Burke, Virginia and was founded by Richard Danker, Robert Garner and Jeff Newman. In 2023, the Florida franchise owned and run by Bob Basham, Outback Steakhouse co-founder, purchased the 22 mid-Atlantic restaurants bringing together all Glory Days Grill locations
under one company with his brother, original co-founder, Richard Danker
. Together, Bob and Richard are excited to be expanding the brand through the Southeast region providing an appeal for sports fans and families, serving quality food in a fun atmosphere.
The Glory Days Experience
Sports-Centric:
Just like when you host a watch party in your own living room, Glory Days Grill aims to provide a real, fun sports experience with our multitude of televisions broadcasting sports games and other entertainment.
Family-Friendly Atmosphere:
The restaurant aims to be welcoming of all ages, with a menu and entertainment options that appeal to a wide range of preferences.
Award-Winning Menu:
We are passionate about our wide array of made-in house menu items being fresh and craveably delicious from our variety of jumbo wings to fresh grilled burgers. We also offer a variety of freshly prepared starters, entrees, sandwiches, and more.
Community Involvement:
Glory Days Grill is proud to be a community partner and give back to our local sports teams and organizations.
Full-Service Bar:
Provides a full bar with a selection of drinks, including every-day, all-day happy hour specials.

Join the Team
At Glory Days Grill we are focused on our core principles of Hospitality, Quality, Sharing, Courage, and Fun! These fundamentals are what we stand behind to create an exceptional experience for our guests, and it starts by taking care of our Team members. If you are looking for a fun and fast-paced environment with tons of growth opportunities, then Glory Days Grill is the place for you!
Employment Benefits include:
Competitive Salary
Paid and in-Depth Training
Meal Discounts
Medical Benefits
Paid Time Off
401(k) Benefits
Bonus Program for Managers
Lucrative Managing Partner Program
Career Growth and Opportunities
We are always looking for amazing talent in both management roles and our important hourly positions.
Submit your application below for Management and Hourly positions:
If you are inquiring about our restaurants in
Maryland, Virginia and West Virginia, to help expedite the interview process please apply online
. We will contact all qualified applicants based on open positions.
If you are inquiring about our restaurants in Florida, to help expedite the interview process please apply online
Employment Application & complete our Patterned Testing for Florida
. We will contact all qualified applicants based on open positions.
If you are inquiring about our restaurants in
Richmond, Virginia, please complete the Employment Application
and deliver it in person to the restaurant between 2:00-4:00 p.m. daily, or call between 2:30 – 5:00 pm and make an appointment with a manager (which is the preferred method). Be sure to fill out your availability, as this is important.
